txt.en: Medi has asked you to defeat gaunt-men at Dol Ernil.\n\nDol Ernil is in northern Cardolan.

'You return! Tell me, were you able to vanquish them?'

You inform her that you did.

'Oh thank you. Thank you! Perhaps I will sleep at last.'
Amidst the ruins of Dol Ernil, the restless Dead shuffle across crumbling stone.
You should let Medi know that there are far fewer gaunt-men to haunt her dreams.\n\nMedi is at Gerwyn's convoy.

'Well met, traveller. When we tried to pass below Dol Ernil, we were attacked on the road by an evil most foul. I must admit that I am terrified and have not slept a moment since that night. I see them when I close my eyes - gaunt-men with their horrifying countenances.\n\n'Please, send them back to the grave, that I may sleep again!'
